question: [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/node-checker/src/common/common_args.rs] [Struct: OutputArgs] [Clone in Multithreaded Context] Since OutputArgs is Clone, can multiple threads clone and use the same output_path concurrently, leading to race conditions in write()? (Medium)
